hacks.name: The Keplerphone
hacks.desc: Music synthesis from the Kepler satellite. Shredding exoplanet rock.

hacks.name: Yankomatic
hacks.desc: Automatically generate song title parodies using rhyming food words.

hacks.name: Handmadedness
hacks.desc: Calculate how hand-made a song sounds by measuring repetition patterns and tempo stability.

hacks.name: Frankenmasher 2000
hacks.desc: Isolate and recombine vocals and instruments from different songs to create mash-ups of hypothetical super-groups.

hacks.name: Mend-a-break
hacks.desc: Resynthesize any audio clip using sparse convolutions of the Amen Break.

hacks.name: Auto-chip-tune
hacks.desc:
Generate Nintendo chip-tune programs from audio analysis.

Version 2
